channel.title: Comments on: SQLCop update Version 1.1
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
hehe I ran some of those dynamic SQL checks on an older database (not developed by me) and found this gem

sp_executesql ‘exec(”select * from..”’+ @bla +’)”’

because you know that sp_executesql is superior to exec if you don’t use the parameters correctly sigh

Thanks again for all the work you have been putting into this tool
